member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE
member.summary: Indicates the type of message passed in the structure to theCopyFile2ProgressRoutine callback function.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE.COPYFILE2_CALLBACK_CHUNK_STARTED
member.summary: Indicates a single chunk of a stream has started to be copied.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE.COPYFILE2_CALLBACK_CHUNK_FINISHED
member.summary: Indicates the copy of a single chunk of a stream has completed.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE.COPYFILE2_CALLBACK_STREAM_STARTED
member.summary: Indicates both source and destination handles for a stream have been opened and the copy of the stream is about to be started.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE.COPYFILE2_CALLBACK_STREAM_FINISHED
member.summary: Indicates the copy operation for a stream have started to be completed.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE_TYPE.COPYFILE2_CALLBACK_MAX
member.summary: An error was encountered during the copy operation.
